content:
In Nikolaev, after the rocket strike in the afternoon on March 21, the number of victims increased.

About thisreportedOva's head Vitaliy Kim.

"Currently, 6 victims, one person has been assisted outpatiently," he wrote.

As reported by the Armyinform, Russian invaders in the afternoon March 21They hitAccording to Nikolaev a ballistic missile. It is also known that one person was killed.
title: Missile attack on Nikolaev: the number of victims increased to six - ova
description: This was reported by the head of Ova Vitaliy Kim. “Currently 6 victims, one person ...
author: Army Inform
